entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Minnedosa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:18 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 9:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early this evening. Freezing rain mixed with snow overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 6:18 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:18 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:18 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
